title: Informatics launches Cloud Innovation Lab
teaser: Students gain hands-on exposure to multi-cloud and DevOps.
body: Informatics Philippines launched a hands-on Cloud Innovation Lab to support modern learning in cloud computing, DevOps, and security. The lab features container orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and observability stacksâ€”providing students with real-world experience.

title: Business Analytics Capstone Showcase
teaser: Student teams present data-driven solutions to SME problems.
body: Student teams from Business Analytics presented capstone projects addressing real business problems in partnership with local SMEs. Solutions covered interactive dashboards, forecasting models, and process improvement analytics.

title: CompTIA-aligned Cybersecurity Bootcamp
teaser: Pathway prepares learners for Security+ and SOC roles.
body: The intensive cybersecurity short-course pathway aligns with CompTIA competencies and prepares learners for Security+ certification and SOC analyst roles. Sessions include secure coding, threat modeling, and defensive operations labs.
